tag_list: emprendego, mobile-app, decorapolis, furniture, decoration, art-and-interior-design
overview:
María Dolores Mozo is the Founder and CEO of Decorapolis.com, a Website and FREE Mobile App about Furniture, Decoration, Art and Interior Design. Professionals and Fans freely upload contents and interact between them. Decorapolis allows browse photos of nearby artistic places & Objects and see what looks good to visit. It makes finding “good art” as easy as looking in a shop window. Spot and recommend only the Artistic objects & places you love. The users can use the Decorapolis search engine to explore near your location, in your neighborhood, your city, your country or anywhere in the world. Use it to find objects, ambiences and places interesting for their art, design, or decoration.

Winner EmprendeGO 2012 Award: services and Ecosystem Mobility- NOKIA SPAIN (Technology Partner).
